heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, providing clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesSubtitle: Our team is composed of experienced and compassionate guides, dedicated to holding a safe and sacred space for your healing journey.
contactCommunityText: Follow our social media to stay updated on upcoming ceremonies, events, and inspiring content. Connect with other seekers and share your journey.

whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral medicine from the Amazon rainforest, a sacred brew made from the decoction of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of the Chacruna shrub (Psychotria viridis). This brew has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples for healing, spiritual, and divination purposes. It acts as a gateway to the subconscious, allowing for deep introspection, trauma release, and a greater connection with oneself and the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Chacruna contains Dimethyltryptamine (DMT), a powerful visionary compound that already exists in our brain. However, our body quickly breaks it down thanks to the MAO enzyme. The Ayahuasca vine acts as an MAO inhibitor (MAOI), allowing DMT to reach the brain and activate its effects. This biochemical interaction opens the doors to an experience that can be profoundly revealing and transformative.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered by indigenous cultures as a spiritual teacher or a wise entity. It is said that 'Mother Ayahuasca' teaches, guides, and purifies. During the ceremony, participants often report receiving visions, insights, and messages that help them heal emotional wounds, understand behavioral patterns, and find their life's purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Many find a renewed sense of direction and purpose.
benefitClarityDescription: Gain a new perspective on your life, relationships, and path. Many find a renewed sense of direction and purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release past traumas, fears, and emotional blockages. Ayahuasca allows you to confront and process deep wounds in a safe and supportive environment.
benefitHealingDescription: Release past traumas, fears, and emotional blockages. Ayahuasca allows you to confront and process deep wounds in a safe and supportive environment.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound sense of unity with nature, the universe, and your higher self. This connection can be lasting and deeply comforting.
benefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound sense of unity with nature, the universe, and your higher self. This connection can be lasting and deeply comforting.
groupCeremonyDescription: Our group ceremonies offer a collective healing space. The group's energy, guided by our facilitators, creates a supportive field where each participant contributes to the experience of others. It is an opportunity to share, connect, and heal in community.
privateCeremonyDescription: For those seeking a more intimate and personalized experience, we offer private ceremonies. These sessions allow for focused attention on your personal intentions and processes, ideal for deep and individualized work.
guidesPageSubtitle: Our team is dedicated to your well-being. Each guide brings deep wisdom, compassion, and experience to hold a safe and transformative space for your journey.
guide_desc_wilson_alfaro: Spiritual guide with a deep connection to Amazonian traditions. Trained in the Peruvian Amazon, Wilson Alfaro brings an ancestral understanding of Ayahuasca and its healing power. His experience facilitates a safe and trustworthy space for personal exploration.
guide_desc_jacob: Spiritual master trained in the Peruvian Amazon, where he learned the sacred use of ancestral medicine directly from healers. With a serene and profound presence, he guides ceremonies at Casa Trinitos (Guanacaste), where he accompanies transformation processes.
guide_desc_harley: Specialist in medical care and first aid, with experience in guided meditations and therapeutic massages. Her calm and professional presence ensures a safe environment throughout the ceremony, providing confidence and support to both the team and the participants.
guide_desc_johanna: Guardian of the medicine trained in the Peruvian Amazon. Providing ceremonies in Colombia and Costa Rica, her presence brings security, support, and balance between the physical and spiritual, upholding the ceremonial space with firmness, care, and a deep connection to female healing.
preparationGuideSubtitle: Follow these steps to align your body, mind, and spirit before your encounter with the medicine.
preparationGuideFullSubtitle: A complete guide to physically, mentally, and spiritually prepare you for your Ayahuasca ceremony. Following these recommendations is essential for a safe, profound, and transformative experience.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions? (e.g., heart problems, high/low blood pressure, liver issues, etc.)
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: If yes, please detail your medical conditions.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any prescription, over-the-counter, or supplemental medications?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If yes, please list all medications and supplements.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions? (e.g., depression, anxiety, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder)
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: If yes, please specify your mental health history.
questionnaireExperience: Have you previously participated in an Ayahuasca ceremony or other psychedelic experience?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If yes, please briefly describe your previous experiences.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or what are you looking to heal/explore in this ceremony?
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was a problem saving your questionnaire. Please try again.
preparationCompleteTitle: You have completed the preparation guide!
preparationCompleteDescription: You are one step closer to your healing journey. Remember to keep your intentions clear and your heart open. We are here to support you every step of the way.
myQuestionnaireAnswersDescription: Here is a summary of the answers you provided.
noAnswersSubmitted: You have not submitted your answers yet.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: These are the answers provided by the user.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
preparationProcessDescription: Preparation is key. It focuses on cleansing the body and mind to receive the medicine.
ceremonyProcessDescription: A guided sacred ritual, where you connect with your inner self and the spirit of the plant.
experienceProcessDescription: A deep journey of introspection, visions, and emotional release in a safe space.
integrationProcessDescription: The process of applying the teachings and healing in your daily life after the ceremony.
dietSubtitle: A clean diet purifies your body, sharpens your sensitivity, and deepens your connection with the medicine.
allowedFoodsList:
• Whole grains (rice, quinoa, oats)
• Legumes (lentils, chickpeas)
• Fresh and steamed vegetables
• Fresh fruits
• White fish and chicken (skinless, grilled or boiled)
• Pure water and herbal teas
prohibitedFoodsList:
• Red meat and pork
• Fried or processed foods
• Dairy and fermented cheeses
• Refined sugars and spicy foods
• Caffeine and alcohol
• Citrus fruits (orange, lemon) on the day of the ceremony
mentalPrepSubtitle: Calming the mind and setting a clear intention is as important as the physical diet.
meditationDescription: Practice daily meditation to calm the mind and reduce anxiety. Stillness prepares you to navigate the inner journey.
intentionsDescription: Reflect on what you want to heal, understand, or release. A clear intention acts as a compass during the ceremony.
reflectionDescription: Write down your thoughts, fears, and hopes. This process helps you connect with your current emotional state.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring suppressed emotions to the surface. Prepare to be vulnerable and allow yourself to feel without judgment. Trust the process; release is part of healing. Our team is here to support you at every moment.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring to the Ceremony?
whatToBringSubtitle: Dress in layers and bring items that provide comfort and support your process.
comfortItemsList:
• Comfortable and warm clothing (in layers)
• Extra blanket and pillow
• Personal water bottle
• Personal object or amulet (optional)
essentialsList:
• Journal and pen
• Tissues or small towel
• Lip balm
• An open mind and heart
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this page.

backupSubtitle: Export or import all application data.
exportDataDescription: Create a full backup of all Firestore data (ceremonies, users, content, etc.) to a JSON file.
importDataDescription: Restore the application from a JSON backup file. This will overwrite all existing data.
importWarningDescription: You are about to overwrite ALL application data. This action cannot be undone. An automatic backup will be created before importing.
rollbackCardDescription: An automatic backup was created before your last import. You can use it to revert the changes if something went wrong.
rollbackSuccessDescription: The data has been restored to the state before the import.
rollbackWarningDescription: Are you sure you want to undo the last import? This will replace the current data with the automatic backup.
themeCustomizationDescription: Adjust the application's color palette for light and dark modes.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all chatbot conversations with users.
errorLogsSubtitle: Monitor errors and issues occurring in the application.
logDetailsDescription: Detailed information about the captured error.
analyticsDescription: Visualize user engagement with different page sections.
resetAnalyticsConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete all section click data. This is irreversible.

inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: This ceremony will not be visible to users, but will be kept in the system.
